languages.text: "Вы вернулись! Да благословит Бог-Император каждый ваш шаг. Возможно, теперь вы сможете разрешить наш спор?" {n}Юный священнник широко вам улыбается.{/n}
"You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы вернулись! Да благословит Бог-Император каждый ваш шаг. Возможно, теперь вы сможете разрешить наш спор?" {n}Юный священнник широко вам улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}
"You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}
"You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}

"You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}
"You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}

languages.text: “您回来了！愿神皇时时刻刻保佑您！莫非您终于打算结束我们之间的论战了吗？”{n}年轻的牧师带着灿烂的笑容向你致意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “您回来了！愿神皇时时刻刻保佑您！莫非您终于打算结束我们之间的论战了吗？”{n}年轻的牧师带着灿烂的笑容向你致意。{/n}

languages.text: 「お戻りになりましたか！神帝陛下があなた様の一歩一歩を祝福されますように！ついに私たちの議論に決着をつけに来てくださったのですか？」{n}若い司祭は満面の笑みであなたを迎えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お戻りになりましたか！神帝陛下があなた様の一歩一歩を祝福されますように！ついに私たちの議論に決着をつけに来てくださったのですか？」{n}若い司祭は満面の笑みであなたを迎えた。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Ha vuelto! ¡Que el Dios Emperador bendiga sus pasos! ¿Ha decidido ya ayudarnos a zanjar nuestro debate?». {n}El joven sacerdote te saluda con una radiante sonrisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Ha vuelto! ¡Que el Dios Emperador bendiga sus pasos! ¿Ha decidido ya ayudarnos a zanjar nuestro debate?». {n}El joven sacerdote te saluda con una radiante sonrisa.{/n}

languages.text: "Döndünüz! Tanrı İmparator her adımınızı kutsasın! Nihayet tartışmamıza nokta koymaya mı geldiniz?" {n}Genç rahip seni ışıl ışıl bir gülümsemeyle karşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Döndünüz! Tanrı İmparator her adımınızı kutsasın! Nihayet tartışmamıza nokta koymaya mı geldiniz?" {n}Küçük olan rahip seni ışıl ışıl bir gülümsemeyle karşılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous êtes de retour ! Que l'Empereur-Dieu bénisse chacun de vos pas ! Se pourrait-il que vous souhaitiez enfin trancher notre controverse ? » {n}demande le jeune prêtre avec un sourire radieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes de retour ! Que l'Empereur-Dieu bénisse chacun de vos pas ! Se pourrait-il que vous souhaitiez enfin trancher notre controverse ? » {n}demande le jeune prêtre avec un sourire radieux.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr seid zurück! Der Gottimperator segne jeden Eurer Schritte! Möchtet Ihr vielleicht unsere Debatte doch noch beilegen?" {n}Der junge Priester grüßt dich mit einem strahlenden Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You're back! God-Emperor bless your every step! Could it be that you wish to settle our debate at last?" {n}The young priest greets you with a beaming smile.{/n}
